mapper.update: update blog_type set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, create_time, modify_time, user_id, status from blog_type
